description: This file defines a Python class `ConfluenceClient` which provides an asynchronous client for interacting with the Confluence Cloud REST API using the `httpx` library. It includes methods for searching pages, listing spaces, and creating pages, encapsulating API interaction details.

classes.name: ConfluenceClient
classes.description: A client for interacting with Atlassian Confluence Cloud via REST API, supporting page search, listing spaces, and creating pages with Bearer token authentication.

methods.name: __init__(self, access_token: str, cloud_id: str, base_url: str | None = None, timeout: float = 20.0)
methods.description: Initializes a ConfluenceClient with an access token, cloud ID, optional base URL, and timeout.

methods.name: Dict[str,str] _headers(self)
methods.description: Generates the HTTP headers used for authenticated requests.

methods.name: str _url(self, path: str)
methods.description: Constructs the complete API URL for a given API path.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] search_pages(self, query: str)
methods.description: Asynchronously searches for pages matching a query string.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] list_spaces(self)
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a list of spaces from Confluence.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_page(self, space_key: str, title: str, body: str)
methods.description: Asynchronously creates a new page in a specified space with a given title and body content.

ctags.name: __init__
ctags.pattern: /^    def __init__(self, access_token: str, cloud_id: str, base_url: str | None = None, timeout: f/
ctags.signature: (self, access_token: str, cloud_id: str, base_url: str | None = None, timeout: float = 20.0)

ctags.name: create_page
ctags.pattern: /^    async def create_page(self, space_key: str, title: str, body: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
ctags.signature: (self, space_key: str, title: str, body: str)

ctags.name: search_pages
ctags.pattern: /^    async def search_pages(self, query: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/
